meta.title: Excellent Life Foundation
meta.description: Empowering Our Community to Live Excellent Lives

hero.title: Empowering Our Community to Live Excellent Lives
hero.subtitle: Join us in creating lasting change through education, health, and economic empowerment programs.

about.title: About Us
about.missionText: To give hope to those without in the community
about.visionText: To empower the community with knowledge and life skills through social work

youthEmpowerment.title: Youth Empowerment
youthEmpowerment.description: Empowering young people through education, skills development, and mentorship programs.

communityWellness.title: Community Wellness
communityWellness.description: Improving health outcomes and promoting wellness within our communities.

economicUplift.title: Economic Uplift
economicUplift.description: Creating economic opportunities and promoting financial literacy.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved With Us
getInvolved.description: There are many ways you can make a difference in our community. Whether you volunteer your time, donate resources, or spread the word about our work, your support helps us create lasting change.

stories.title: Maria's Journey: From Participant to Program Leader
stories.quote: The Excellent Life Foundation gave me more than just resources; they gave me hope, skills, and the opportunity to transform my life. Now I'm empowering others with the same tools that changed my life.
stories.story: Maria's journey began when she was struggling to support her family after losing her job. Through our Youth Empowerment Program, she gained valuable skills and found a path to financial stability. She has since become one of our program leaders, mentoring others facing similar challenges.

event1.title: Stay Tuned for Updates!
event1.description: We're currently planning exciting events for our community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out to us with any questions, suggestions, or to learn more about our work.
contact.addressText: Amukura house, behind EasyCoach door no.11 along Busia-Kisumu highway

getHelp.title: Get Help
getHelp.description: If you or someone you know needs assistance, we're here to support you. Our programs provide resources and opportunities to help you succeed.
getHelp.wellnessDescription: Get support for health and wellness needs.
